gameModes.manualTitle:
In manual mode, the game rules aren't handled automatically.
All cards are supported but you'll need to communicate with your opponent as if you were playing IRL.
gameModes.automaticTitle:
In automatic mode, the game handles the rules automatically.
Not all cards are supported yet and it still needs improvements but it can be more comfortable than playing manually.

mainMenu.unofficialNotice: This is a fan-made implementation of Cross Universe. The official page is at {#LINK}!

settings.title: Lobby Settings
settings.name: Name:
settings.automaticTitle:
Determines whether or not the game rules are checked automatically.
Note: Not all cards exist in automatic games.
settings.oldManaRuleTitle:
Before a February 2021 rules revision, both players would always gain mana at the start of the first player's turn.
This re-enables that version of the rules.
Note: There is a reason this got changed, and newer cards are not balanced to work under the old rules.

notices.connectionLost:
Lost connection to your opponent.
This is currently unrecoverable so you can leave the game now:

general.title: General

languageWarnings.incomplete: This language might be incomplete. Click here to help out.
languageWarnings.noRules: The game rules are not available in this language.
languageWarnings.noCards: The cards are not available in this language. English cards will be shown.
languageWarnings.partialCards: Not all cards are available in this language. Missing cards will be in English.

customization.title: Customization
customization.opponentCardLanguage: Show Opponent Cards in their Language
customization.previewCardLanguage: Also Show Card Preview in that Language
customization.fieldLeftToggle: Place Field on The Left Side of your Screen
customization.mainMenuCards: Show Floating Cards in Main Menu

auto.title: Automatic Games
auto.usePrivateInfoForAutopass: Allow auto-pass to use hand knowledge
auto.passInDrawPhase: Auto-pass through draw phase if you have no draw phase specific options or triggers
auto.passInBattlePhase: Auto-pass in the battle phase if you have no responses or battle phase specific options
auto.passInEndPhase: Auto-pass through end phase if you have no end phase specific options or triggers
auto.passOnStackTwo: Auto-pass on empty stacks 2+ if you have no trigger abilities or conditional spells
auto.passOnOwnBlocks: Auto-pass on your own actions if opponent did not intervene

deckMaker.title: Deck Maker
deckMaker.autoWarning: Warn about decks unsupported in automatic mode

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.websocketUrlTitle:
This lets you override the server that is used to establish and proxy game sessions.
If this is not the same as your opponent's you WILL NOT be able to connect.
advanced.lobbyServerUrlTitle:
This lets you override the server that lobbies are loaded from, opened on.
If this is not the same as for other people, you won't be able to see or interact with eachother's lobbies.
advanced.cardImageUrlTitle: This lets you override the server that card images are loaded from. This server should be able to provide English and Japanese card images and provide a /random endpoint which redirects to a random card image.
advanced.cardDataApiUrlTitle: This lets you override the API endpoint that is used to query card data. This is used by both the deck creator and the main game.

deckMaker.title: Deck Creator
deckMaker.unsavedChangesWarning:

warnings.needsUnit: A deck needs to have a unit.
warnings.noTokens: A deck may not contain any Tokens.

warnings.unsupported: Some cards in this deck are unsupported in automatic matches.

deckMenu.deckCodeImportPrompt:
Paste your deck code.
(It should look similar to this: a4z8bb3n558a77sa1gi2h8pg8a2v4i58a )

customCards.title: Custom Cards
customCards.scriptingExperimentalWarning:
Note: Effect scripting is currently experimental.
That means it is poorly documented and the scripting language might change at any point, potentially breaking your old scripts.
customCards.enterEffectsScripts:
Enter effect scripts here, like so:

o: optional
turnLimit: 1
condition: thisCard.zone = field
cost:
DISCARD(SELECT(1, [from you.hand]))
exec:
opponent.DAMAGE(100)
customCards.noSavedCards: You haven't saved any cards yet.
customCards.unsavedChanges:
You currently have unsaved changes.
If you proceed, those changes will be lost.
customCards.reallyDelete:
Do you really want to delete '{#CARDNAME}'?
This action cannot be undone. '{#CARDNAME}' will be gone forever.
